name: Arroz
introduction: Arroz is the greatest nation as we worship

name: Hungary
declaringWar: It's time to enlarge the Hungarian lands! You'd better give up right away!
attacked: You fool! You don't know what you're up for!
defeated: How is it possible? The Hungarian army was supposed to be unstoppable!
introduction: Hello Stranger. You have just reached the vast lands of the Kingdom of Hungary!
neutralHello: What do you need, my friend?
hateHello: Look, who has honored us with his presence!
uniques: Gain gold for each unit killed
[-2 Happiness] in all cities with a garrison

name: Belgium
declaringWar: I didn't think it would come to this...
attacked: Ha, the Belgians will resist until the end!
defeated: The Belgians will never be obedient to you.
introduction: Hello, I'm Albert, king of the Belgians. I hope our countries will live in peace.
hateHello: What do you want from us?
tradeRequest: What do you think about our offer?

name: Livonia
declaringWar: Our mighty knights would smash your heretics.
attacked: Ha, the brave knights of order will resist until the end!
defeated: The people of Terra Marianna will never be under your rule.
introduction: Hello, I'm Johannes, archbishop of Riga. I hope our countries will live under the rule of Jesus.
tradeRequest: Would Jesus bless this agreement between us?

name: Romania
declaringWar: Our honorous people would smash you.
attacked: Ha, the brave partisans will resist until the end!
defeated: One day Greater Romania will rise again soon.
introduction: Hello, I'm Carol, king of Valachia, Moldova, Transylvania and Dobruja. I hope our countries will live together in peace.
uniques: +2 happiness for every city connected to capital

name: Crimea
declaringWar: Our blessed people would punch your unfaithful face.
attacked: Ha, the faithful tatars will fight until the end!
defeated: One day Giray Empire will rise again.
introduction: Hello, I'm Mengli, khan and liberator of Tatars. I hope our countries will live together wisely listening to Allah.
uniques: Gain gold for each unit killed
[+1 Culture] in all cities with a garrison

name: Bulgaria
declaringWar: Our intelligent people should show you your place in this world.
attacked: Nah, we will fight until the end!
defeated: Soon Bulgaria will be great again, but not yet.
introduction: Greetings, I'm Boris, king of Greater Bulgaria. Would you join us or you would be our enemy?
hateHello: What do you need here you the spawn of devil?
tradeRequest: Do you think this deal is good?

name: Serbia
declaringWar: My mighty army will make you die.
defeated: One day our partisans would shot you in the head.
introduction: I'm Stefan, tsar of Serbia. Don't do anything silly or you will pay for it.
hateHello: Do you think that I don't have another chores?
uniques: New military units start with [15] Experience
[+1 Production] per [4] population in all cities

name: Theodoro
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Theodoro - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Maribor
declaringWar: You did something really much wrong. I will fix it. Prepare to die!
attacked: Ha! You can't defeat mighty Slovenians.
defeated: You defeated our army but you will never defeat glorious Slovenian people.
